title: National debt of Nigeria in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This statistic shows the National debt of Nigeria from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) .
The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances .
In 2018 , the National debt of Nigeria amounted to approximately 27.26 % of the GDP .
